name: The Seven Deadly Sins: Unjust Sin
name_original: The Seven Deadly Sins: Unjust Sin
description:
The Seven Deadly Sins: Unjust Sin is an action game developed by Bandai Namco Entertainment. It came out on 11-02-2015. It was published by Bandai Namco Entertainment.
The Seven Deadly Sins: Unjust Sin is available on Nintendo 3DS.
